column1: The Purple Pig////Great place for unique and tasty modern tapas! The Purple Pig is located right on Michigan
column2: the dining space is actually a bit smaller than expected but the interior is cozy and inviting
column3: with the kitchen in full display. Came here with my girlfriend for an early valentine's day and had a delicious meal. Their menu is surprisingly varied
column8: and even a section for offals (organs!). We decided in the crispy pig ear (apparently a popular item)
